disease: Malignant neoplasm of peripheral nerves of pelvis

physical_findings: Growing lump or mass in the pelvic region
Elastic and hard mass on palpation (in one case report)

imaging_findings.CT: Heterogeneous mass in the right greater sciatic foramen
imaging_findings.MRI: Heterogeneous, signal-hyperintense mass on T2-weighted imaging
imaging_findings.PET-CT: High uptake (SUVmax 12.7) consistent with pelvic mass

required: Imaging findings suggestive of a pelvic mass
Histopathological examination showing atypical spindle-shaped cells
supportive: Symptoms of pain, weakness, or numbness in the lower extremities
